body:
Tried on RHEL7.

TLDR: Everything works.

Scary things:

```
unable to convert "\xE0" from ASCII-8BIT to UTF-8 for src/ruby/lib/grpc/2.0/grpc_c.so, skipping

```

... and waiting for #5205
